column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////For my loved ones that visit me in Houston
column2: I bring them here! I love the life-loving vibe that this establishment offers. Everything I have tried here is lovely. My favorite thing to get off of the menu is their ham and cheese sandwich
column3: which comes on a croissant (*buttery flaky crust*). My favorite dessert to get here is their oh
column4: so popular kouign-amann (pronounced queen uhmon). I have also tried the plain croissant
column7: and macarons. They are ALL wonderful
column8: and I would definitely recommend or reorder all of them.
